title: Riot Kayle
body: I got on my account and it unlocked the summoner icon and kayle (i didn't previously unlock her) but i didn't get Riot kayle. I thought that even if you didn't have kayle that you get the skin? Does anyone have any clue why I didn't get the skin?{{champion:10}}

replies.body: *Zombiemaster* is correct. We're sending these gifts out in batches to ensure they get out properly. If you don't have Riot Kayle by the 30th of this month, please let me know.

The gifts are handed out individually, not at the same time, so it's normal to receive one without yet receiving the others. The gifts are still being distributed, and the final date to receive them has been pushed back to the 30th as per the banner on the support page. Just hang tight and you will get it soon enough! :)
Alright thanks for replying. I shall patiently wait for my rito kayle.
